entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023
